presets.title: Line chart
presets.desc: Requires one column for X values or categories, subsequently one column for each series' Y values.

presets.title: With data labels
presets.desc: Requires one column for X values or categories, subsequently one column for each series' Y values. Data labels by default displays the Y value.

presets.title: Spline
presets.desc: Requires one column for X values or categories, subsequently one column for each series' Y values.

presets.title: Spline with labels
presets.desc: Requires one column for X values or categories, subsequently one column for each series' Y values.

presets.title: Logarithmic
presets.desc: Requires one column for X values or categories, subsequently one column for each series' Y values.

presets.title: Step line
presets.desc: Requires one column for X values or categories, subsequently one column for each series' Y values.

presets.title: Step line with labels
presets.desc: Requires one column for X values or categories, subsequently one column for each series' Y values.

presets.title: Inverted
presets.desc: Requires one column for X values or categories, subsequently one column for each series' Y values.

presets.title: Negative color
presets.desc: Requires one column for X values or categories, subsequently one column for each series' Y values.

presets.title: Error bar
presets.desc: Requires one data column for X values or categories, subsequently one data column for the series' Y values and two columns for the error bar series maximum and minimum.

presets.title: Combination chart
presets.desc: Requires one column for X values or categories, subsequently one column for each series' Y values.

presets.title: Negative color
presets.desc: Displays negative values with an alternative color. Colors can be set in plotOptions.series.negativeColor. Requires one column for X values or categories, subsequently one column for each series' Y values.

presets.title: Area range
presets.desc: Requires one data column for X values or categories, subsequently two data column for each arearange series' Y values.

presets.title: Basic
presets.description: Grouped column chart. Requires one data column for X values or categories, subsequently one data column for each series' Y values.

presets.title: With labels
presets.description: Grouped column chart. Requires one data column for X values or categories, subsequently one data column for each series' Y values.

presets.title: Column 3D
presets.description: Grouped column chart. Requires one data column for X values or categories, subsequently one data column for each series' Y values.

presets.description: Requires one data column for X values or categories, subsequently one data column for each series' Y values.
